resources.string: Phone verification
Change phone number by receiving a verification code
If you want to change your phone number, you can do so automatically using a verification code sent to your phone and email.
Use your registered phone number and email to receive a verification code to bind a new phone number
Send verification code
The original email or phone cannot receive the verification code. Please contact customer service to change your phone number.
Human customer service
New mobile phone number verification
Final step: Verify your new phone number
Enter your new phone number correctly to receive a verification code
Your current mobile phone number is
New mobile phone number
Please enter new mobile number
The entered number is incorrect. Try again
Send verification code
New mobile phone number linked successfully
Return to home page
Phone verification
Change your mobile number
Requirements to be met before updating your email address
Take a selfie holding your passport or ID card
Receive a verification code via your new number
We will verify your information and update your mobile number
This usually takes 10 minutes, but can take up to 3 days
Continue
Upload and view your selfie
"We only accept passports, ID cards or driver's licenses for identity verification."
Your selfie must show:
Your full face and ID
First and last name on your ID
Clear ID photo
Selfie example:
Selfie verification failed. Please upload again
Mobile phone verification application submitted successfully
We will verify your information and update your phone number. You will be notified of the result via system message or SMS.
This usually takes 10 minutes, but can take up to 3 days
